Description: * {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hook T1 reduced from 30% more weapon damage to 25%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} T2 reduced from +60% weapon damage to +50%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} damage reduced from 120 to 110
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T2 reduced from +80 Damage to +75
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Bullet Damage increased from 2 to 2.2
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} Radius increased from 4m to 4.5m
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} T2 damage increased from +50 to +75
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} now destroys {{PageRef|Breakable|alt_name=breakable}}s it runs through
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} T2 increased from 25% movespeed to 35%
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Bullet damage growth increased from 1.5 to 1.7
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} T2 reduced from 140 to 120
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} now triggers on units. Uses half cooldown when triggered this way.
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} damage reduced from 75 to 60
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} spirit scaling increased from 1 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} T2 increased from 75 to 85
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Crackshot}} T3 now also has -2s on {{PageRef|Creep|alt_name=creeps}}
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Crackshot}} applying {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}}'s anti-teleport debuff
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} T2 duration increased from +0.5 to +0.75
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Fixed height on damage from {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} sometimes causing it to not hurt heroes on your lasso
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Health increased from 600 to 650
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Fire Scarabs}} Max Health Steal reduced from 75 to 50
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Fire Scarabs}} Max Health Steal spirit scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.4
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Bullet Damage reduced from 5.7 to 5.5
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Slice and Dice}} damage reduced from 110 to 100
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Slice and Dice}} T2 reduced from +70 to +60
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Slice and Dice}} spirit scaling increased from 1.3 to 1.55
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} deferred damage duration reduced from 13s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} cooldown increased from 50s to 60s
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} movespeed increased from 25% to 35%
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} can no longer be applied to {{PageRef|Unstoppable}}
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} now triggers {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Debuff Reducer}} not working on Rabbit
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: Teleporting now drops the {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}}
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} base damage reduced from 120 to 110
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} base cooldown increased from 30s to 40s
* The Magnificent {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} base duration decreased from 8s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Movespeed reduced from 9 to 8
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Bullet Velocity reduced from 810 to 740
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Bullet Damage decreased from 9 to 7
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Move Speed reduced from 7.3 to 7.0
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} Max Damage reduced from 200 to 180
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Slither}} T3 spirit and bullet resist while sliding reduced from +30% to +25%
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} spirit scaling reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} cooldown increased from 0.65 to 0.75
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} summon rate from non-heroes reduced from 0.35 to 0.25
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} silence and disarm duration increased from 2.5s to 3s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} cast delay reduced from 0.4s to 0.3s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} up/down motion now lasts 0.25s longer and moves a little bit higher
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.27 to 0.24
* All heroes base {{PageRef|Weapon|alt_name=gun}} damage and growth reduced by 10% (numbers listed above are before this global reduction)
* {{PageRef|Extra Stamina}}: Fire Rate reduced from 5% to 4%
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Reduced from -40% Effectiveness vs non-heroes to -50%
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Weapon Damage in radius reduced from +50% to +40%
* {{PageRef|Hunter's Aura}}: Bullet Resist Reduction reduced from -9% to -8%
* {{PageRef|Hunter's Aura}}: Fire Rate Slow increased from -9% to -10%
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Weapon Damage reduced from 30% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Movespeed penalty increased from -0.5 to -1
